name: CoCycle
body: **CoCycle** is a mass cycle commuting project borne out of the [OPEN Glasgow](http://open.glasgow.gov.uk/) 2014 Transport Hack, the website for which is currently in development [on Github](https://github.com/CoCycle/).  **cocycle.org** will run on [free software](https://www.gnu.org/philosophy/free-sw.html), granting you freedom to run, copy, distribute, study, change and improve it as permitted by [the MIT License](https://github.com/CoCycle/cocycle/blob/master/LICENSE).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
